anya-e1214n4:3: Sivu tantūnasantāne khī khaye khā pakāsane;
anya-e1214n4:5: Kā-gā sadde (pi) ghā gandho’pādāne ruca rocane,
anya-e1214n4:6: Kaca dityaṁ muca moce (atho) vica vivecane;
anya-e1214n4:8: Rañja rāge sañja saṅge khalane majja suddhiyaṁ,
anya-e1214n4:9: Yujo samādhimhi lujo vināse jhā vicintane;
anya-e1214n4:11: Tā pālane chidi dvedhākāre mida sinehane,
anya-e1214n4:14: Sida pāke padagate vida sattā vicintane,
anya-e1214n4:15: Dī khaye supane dā (ca) dāne dātva’vakhaṇḍane;
anya-e1214n4:18: Kudha kope sudha soce rādha hiṁsāya siddhiyaṁ;
anya-e1214n4:21: Vidha vedhe gidha gedhe rudhi āvaraṇā’disu;
anya-e1214n4:24: Sinā soce kupa kope tapa santāpa pīṇane;
anya-e1214n4:26: Lupacchede rupa nāse pakāse dipa dittiyaṁ,
anya-e1214n4:27: Dapa hāse labha lābhe lubha gedhe khubho cale;
anya-e1214n4:32: Lī silese dravīkāre vā gatī bandhanesu (ca,)
anya-e1214n4:39: Susa sose bhasa adhopāte nasa adassane;
anya-e1214n4:40: 116. Sā’ssāde sā’vasāne (ca) sā tanūkaraṇe (pi ca) hā cāge muha vecitte naha sajjanabandhane naha soce pihicchāyaṁ siniha-saniha pītiyaṁ.
